snippet.title: Mega Man Maker - Create your own Mega Man levels! - Official trailer
snippet.description:
Official website and download: https://megamanmaker.com/
Join the official Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/a3BAjBn
Join the forums: https://megamanmaker.com/forum/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MegaManMaker

Mega Maker is a new and accessible way to create and share your own Mega Man levels. From full-length Robot Master stages to puzzle levels, anything goes! Upload your levels to share them with the world or play levels created by other users with ease!


Trailer by Shinryu: https://www.youtube.com/user/Shinryuu82
Logo and artwork by Gaem: https://www.youtube.com/user/MrSean2543
Music by CosmicGem: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRimElPGccPl_gJk7L7avXQ


Mega Maker is a fan-made game inspired by the Mega Man series. We are not affiliated with Capcom in any way.
